name: Global New Energy Finance
goal:
GNE Finance (Global New Energy Finance) is an Advisory and Investment Manager for Sustainable Infrastructure and Climate-Aligned Projects that brings the expertise, track-record and network to promote, structure, and finance clean energy projects.
GNE Finance is leading the development of EuroPACE financing platform under the auspices of the Horizon 2020 project, EuroPACE, awarded in 2018 under a grant agreement No 785057.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment
euInitiatives: GNE Finance is promoting EuroPACE (on-tax financing tool aimed to increase investment in energy efficiency in buildings), thus the company is inclined to support and promote policies that assist in the implementation of EuroPACE. In this regard, GNE Finance is interested in following up with the policy developments related to Energy Performance in Buildings Directive, Energy Efficiency Directive, Capital Markets Union and the whole Winter Package that unites a broad array of initiatives that are in line with financing deep energy retrofits in buildings.
